DOC.brief_summary: purpose study compare ability propafenone dronedarone maintain sinus rhythm DC cardioversion
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Propafenone Versus Dronedarone Maintenance Sinus Rhythm Patients With Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.detailed_description: Atrial fibrillation common arrhythmia require continuous therapy . Conversion maintenance sinus rhythm important . Propafenone dronedarone use treatment maintenance sinus rhythm DC cardioversion . But direct comparison study . The purpose study compare ability propafenone dronedarone maintain sinus rhythm DC cardioversion .
DOC.criteria: patient persistent atrial fibrillation receive successful DC cardioversion prior amiodarone use NYHA class III IV heart failure Left ventricular ejection fraction < 35 % second third AV block sick sinus syndrome heart rate < 50 beat per minute myocardiac infarction within 3 month pregnant woman severe hepatic dysfunction QT prolongation > 500ms PR interval > 180ms history hypersensitivity drug
